algorithm_technique: Observing the pattern of numbers generated by the modulo operation.
problem_summary_simple: Find how many distinct numbers appear on a board after many days, starting with one number.
problem_summary_technical: Simulates a process where numbers x generate numbers i such that x % i == 1, counting distinct values after many iterations.
key_insights: The core operation is finding numbers `i` such that `x % i == 1`. This implies `i` must be a divisor of `x-1`.
The process generates numbers `n-1`, `n-2`, ..., `2`. Any number `x` can generate `x-1` if `x % (x-1) == 1`.
The problem simplifies to counting numbers from 2 to n, as all these can eventually be generated.
